name: Electric Starfish
overview: On the distant planet of Thule water must be conserved and you must control the constructor robots to build the resevoirs. The only problem is that the native predator of Thule, a kind of giant starfish, is deadly and will stop you if it can. Can you store enough water to ensure that Thule survives? A Qix style game by Murvyn Pikestriker, however there have been unsubstantiated claims that it was an unauthorized rip off of a Tom Hudson game called Fill'er up!.
